New Records: Brendan Donovan hit his 11th homer and his first three-run drive since July 23, 2023
Key Match Events: Iván Herrera hit an RBI double in the sixth and scored on a throwing error by Yankees catcher Austin Wells
Giancarlo Stanton’s three-run double off the top of the center-field fence made it a one-run game
Ryan Helsley worked a shaky ninth for his 42nd save in 45 chances
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge reacted after being called out on strikes during the sixth inning
Aaron Boone said he thought Andrew Kittredge caught Giancarlo Stanton's three-run double just enough off the end
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals improved to 1-7 at Yankee Stadium in the regular season
The Cardinals won their first regular-season win at Yankee Stadium since Tim McCarver hit a three-run homer in the 10th inning in Game 5 of the 1964 World Series
